pages.title: Turtlemy 101
pages.text: Glad you are interested in $(turtlemancy)Turtlemy$(), $(playername). Let me make a quick introduction to how it works. To begin with $(turtlemancy)Turtlemy$() you need two things: a $(item)Turtle Cauldron$() and $(thing)water$().

As a $(turtlemancer) you must know how powerful $(thing)water$() is and that heating it won't make the $(thing)water$() more powerful or anything.$(br2)So, unlike other $(thing)alchemy$() systems, with $(turtlemancy)Turtlemy$() you don't need to heat the $(thing)water$() therefore, don't be afraid of making a mistake in $(turtlemancy)Turtlemy$(). You won't lose your items.
Remember to fill it with water, don't make a fool of yourself throwing stuff into an empty cauldron.
